document_data.name: The Orc Marches
document_data.result: Victory of elves, defeat of orcs
document_data.mainbody: The '''Orc Marches''' was the name given to one of the biggest [[orc]] conquests of the [[North]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|-111}}, several massive orc hordes came south from their homes in the [[Spine of the World]] and [[Ice Mountains]] to devastate the civilizations of the North.

The orcs nearly crippled the [[dwarf|dwarven]] realm of [[Delzoun]] through numerous attacks, and overran its capital city, [[Gauntlgrym]]. They also conquered the [[human]] city of [[Illusk]]; the majority of Illuskans had fled the city before its fall, either onto the sea or with the aid of [[magic]], and survived.

Finally, an alliance of the [[elves]] of [[Iliyanbruen]], [[Rilithar]], [[Siluvanede]], and [[Earlann]] stopped the orcs  before they could reach the [[High Forest]] and [[Dessarin River|Dessarin Valley]], and broke their strength.

The Illuskans were able to return and rebuild their home in the {{YearlinkName|-108}}. Gauntlgrym remained abandoned until the {{YearlinkName|141}}, when an effort was made to resettle it.
